mapper.select: select category_no, category_name from category where ref_category_no = 3
mapper.insert: insert into board ( user_no, board_code, board_title, board_content ) values( #{userNo}, 3, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent} )
mapper.select: select board_no, board_title, board_content, category_name from board, (select category_name from category join board_category bc using (category_no) join board b using (board_no) where b.board_code = 4 and b.board_Level = 1 and b.board_status = 'Y') where board_code = 4 and board_Level = 1;

select board_no, board_title, board_content, c.category_name category_name from board, (select category_name from category join board_category bc using (category_no) join board b using (board_no) where b.board_code = 4 and b.board_Level = 1 and b.board_status = 'Y') c where board_code = 4 and board_Level = 1 and board_title like '%' || #{content} || '%'

select board_no, board_title, board_content, c.category_name category_name from board, (select category_name from category join board_category bc using (category_no) join board b using (board_no) where b.board_code = 4 and b.board_Level = 1 and b.board_status = 'Y') c where board_code = 4 and board_Level = 1 and board_content like '%' || #{content} || '%'

select board_no, board_title, board_content, category_name from board, (select category_name from category join board_category bc using (category_no) join board b using (board_no) where b.board_code = 4 and b.board_Level = 1 and category_name = #{categoryName} and b.board_status = 'Y') where board_code = 4 and board_Level = 1;
